conversation.text: I'm planning a family vacation and would like to reserve dinner at Medieval Times in What's the goal? Buena Park, CA, for July 11, 2020 at an evening show for 2 adults, 3 kids below age Single goal 12. I do not need to pay for tickets already have vouchers paid) I just want to 140 px reserve the seats. I'd prefer a 6 pm show, but am fine with anything after 1 pm.
